annotations.description: It's Ground Hog day so I'm talking about the 1993 movie of the same name and making 2 drinks. Rita's favorite and something I call Punxsutawney Phil's Liquid...
annotations.title: Groundhog Day Cocktail | How to Drink

textContent:
1.5 oz. -or- 45 ml. Sweet Vermouth
1.5 oz. -or- 45 ml. Laird's Straight Apple Brandy
2 dashes Angostura Bitters

Stir over Ice and Pour over Big Cube
Express oil from orange peel
Garnish with an Orange Wedge

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4wBV-OtvS6U
title: Punxsutawney Phil's Liquid Courage
